results.title: The Working Programmer - How To Be MEAN: Test Me MEANly
results.description: This is where supertest comes into play; using it, you can create a tiny HTTP agent that knows how to query the endp... Wrapping Up There’s a bunch of material about mocha, supertest and should that I don’t have space to get into—for example, like most testing frameworks, mocha supports before and after hooks that will run around each test; also,.
